name: KMH Cardiology Centres
comment:
Diagnostic imaging clinic

Services include:
  • myocardial perfusion imaging
  • carotid ultrasound
  • echocardiography
  • Holter monitor
  • bone scan
  • renal scan
  • mammography (breast x-rays used to screen and diagnose medical conditions)
